feed.title: ZITNIK LAB
feed.subtitle: Artificial Intelligence for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Accepted tutorial at IJCAI!
entry.content: We will present a tutorial or Machine Learning for Drug Development at IJCAI 2020! Stay tuned for details.
entry.summary: We will present a tutorial or Machine Learning for Drug Development at IJCAI 2020! Stay tuned for details.

entry.title: Graph ML workshop at ICML 2020
entry.content: We will co-organize a workshop of Graph Representation Learning at ICML 2020. Stay tuned for a call for papers and more details!
entry.summary: We will co-organize a workshop of Graph Representation Learning at ICML 2020. Stay tuned for a call for papers and more details!

entry.title: Welcome new students!
entry.content: Haoxin, Michelle, and Xiang joined the lab. Welcome! We look forward to meeting you all in the lab!
entry.summary: Haoxin, Michelle, and Xiang joined the lab. Welcome! We look forward to meeting you all in the lab!

entry.title: Meta learing for single-cell biology
entry.content: New preprint on meta learning for identifying and naming cell types, even cell types that have never been seen before and do not exist in the training data. Check it out!
entry.summary: New preprint on meta learning for identifying and naming cell types, even cell types that have never been seen before and do not exist in the training data. Check it out!

entry.title: Pre-training graph neural networks
entry.content: Strategies for Pre-training Graph Neural Networks accepted as a spotlight paper at ICLR 2020.
entry.summary: Strategies for Pre-training Graph Neural Networks accepted as a spotlight paper at ICLR 2020.

entry.title: Welcome new students!
entry.content: Kathleen, Jingyi, Kexin, Yujie, and Stone joined the lab. Welcome!
entry.summary: Kathleen, Jingyi, Kexin, Yujie, and Stone joined the lab. Welcome!

entry.title: Deep learning for network biology
entry.content: Marinka is co-editing a special issue of ACM/IEEE TCBB on Deep Learning and Graph Embeddings for Network Biology. Submit your finest work!
entry.summary: Marinka is co-editing a special issue of ACM/IEEE TCBB on Deep Learning and Graph Embeddings for Network Biology. Submit your finest work!
